title: Teracopy 2.2 (with key)
description:
TeraCopy Pro is a compact program designed to copy and move files at the maximum possible speed, providing the user with a lot of features: 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Copy files faster. TeraCopy uses dynamically adjusted buffers to reduce seek times. Asynchronous copy speeds up file transfer between two physical hard drives. 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Pause and resume file transfers. Pause copy process at any time to free up system resources and continue with a single click. 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Error recovery. In case of copy error, TeraCopy will try several times and in the worse case just skip the file, not terminating the entire transfer.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Interactive file list. TeraCopy shows failed file transfers and lets you fix the problem and recopy only problem files.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Shell integration. TeraCopy can completely replace Explorer copy and move functions, allowing you work with files as usual. 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Full Unicode support. 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Windows 7 x64 support. 

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Copy/move to favorite folders.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Select files with the same extension/same folder.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢Remove selected files from the copy queue.

ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â€šÂ¬Ã‚Â¢More features coming soon!
